en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors RM 10,000 to Perlis Girl Guide Association!
en.content:
REPORT BY FusionExcel DIRECTOR YM TENGKU KAMARUL AZNAM.

FusionExcel is proud to be the main sponsor for the Perlis Girl Guide Association fund raising project known as "Jejak Kepaduan" organised by the President of the Perlis Girl Guide Association YM Tengku Datin Shireen Bt Tengku Sulaiman.

The event was officiated by DYMM Raja Perempuan Perlis on the 18th July 2009 held at Putra Palace, Kangar, Perlis.

FusionExcel represented by Director YM Tengku Kamarul Aznam presented a mock cheque of RM 10,000 sponsorship to the Patron DYMM Raja Perempuan Perlis.

FusionExcel also presented FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant and Quantum Flask to Her Royal Highness.

During the event, FusionExcel team performed numerous demonstrations to the amazement of those present.

FusionExcel Quantum Pendant received many positive endorsements from the VIP visitors. 



DYMM Raja Perempuan Tengku Fauziah.
DYMM Raja Perempuan Tengku Fauziah & YM Tengku Shireen - President of Perlis Girl Guide. YM Tengku Azman presenting DYMM Raja Perempuan Tengku Fauziah with FusionExcel's Quantum Science Products.
DYMM Raja Perempuan Tengku Fauziah & YAB Menteri Besar of Perlis' Wife Datin Seri Asiah. YAM Tengku Putri Utama Sharifah Salwa & Her Daughter YM Tengku Sharina.
  YM Tengku Aznam with Girl Guides.
